Komako

komakogame.com

Factsheet

Developer:
Crayon Animals
Based in Copenhagen, Denmark
Founding date:
August, 2019
Press / Business contact:
komako@halfpastyellow.com
-

Description

Komako is a narrative game where the lead character, Komako, explores an abandoned theme park. Throughout the game Komako meets the park’s inhabitants and is drawn into their quest to unlock the secret of the park.

Development

Komako is a collaboration project between Artist/Animator Balazs Ronyai and Development Studio Half Past Yellow.
